name: ftm.guru
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: A Multi-faceted growth hacker for indie projects, ftm.guru provides numerous Tools, Services and niche utility-applications to users and bespoke product customization, liquidity enhancement and data analytics products to De-Fi innovators. The Guru Network has something to offer for everyone
